trans-unit.source: Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console
trans-unit.target: Use PuTTY to connect to the device serial console

trans-unit.source: Explains how to use PuTTY terminal emulation software to connect to the StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to use PuTTY terminal emulation software to connect to the StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: To connect through the serial console
trans-unit.target: To connect through the serial console

trans-unit.source: Connect your serial cable to the device (directly or through a USB-serial adapter).
trans-unit.target: Connect your serial cable to the device (directly or through a USB-serial adapter).

trans-unit.source: Open the **Control Panel**, and then open the **Device Manager**.
trans-unit.target: Open the **Control Panel**, and then open the **Device Manager**.

trans-unit.source: Identify the COM port as shown in the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: Identify the COM port as shown in the following illustration.

trans-unit.source: Connecting through serial console
trans-unit.target: Connecting through serial console

trans-unit.source: Start PuTTY.
trans-unit.target: Start PuTTY.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, change the **Connection type** to **Serial**.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, change the **Connection type** to **Serial**.

trans-unit.source: In the right pane, type the appropriate COM port.
trans-unit.target: In the right pane, type the appropriate COM port.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the serial configuration parameters are set as follows:
trans-unit.target: Make sure that the serial configuration parameters are set as follows:

trans-unit.source: Data bits: 8
trans-unit.target: Data bits: 8

trans-unit.source: Stop bits: 1
trans-unit.target: Stop bits: 1

trans-unit.source: Parity: None
trans-unit.target: Parity: None

trans-unit.source: Flow control: None
trans-unit.target: Flow control: None

trans-unit.source: These settings are shown in the following illustration.
trans-unit.target: These settings are shown in the following illustration.

trans-unit.source: PuTTY settings
trans-unit.target: PuTTY settings

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] If the default flow control setting does not work, try setting the flow control to XON/XOFF.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] If the default flow control setting does not work, try setting the flow control to XON/XOFF.

trans-unit.source: Click **Open** to start a serial session.
trans-unit.target: Click **Open** to start a serial session.
